Module cloud.piranha.servlet.api
Package javax.servlet

Interface Filter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthenticationFilter, AuthorizationFilter, AuthorizationPreFilter, GenericFilter, HttpFilter
public interface Filter
The Filter API.
Author:
Manfred Riem (mriem@manorrock.com)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void destroy()
    Destroy the filter.
    void doFilter​(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
    Process the request.
    default void init​(FilterConfig filterConfig)
    Initialize the filter.

  • Method Details

    • init

      default void init​(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException
      Initialize the filter.
      Parameters:
      filterConfig - the filter configuration.
      Throws:
      ServletException - when a servlet error occurs.

    • doFilter

      void doFilter​(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) throws java.io.IOException, ServletException
      Process the request.
      Parameters:
      request - the request.
      response - the response.
      chain - the chain.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an I/O error occurs.
      ServletException - when a servlet error occurs.

    • destroy

      default void destroy()
      Destroy the filter.
